title: My Game stutters when I access the Ping wheel in game.
body:
Every time I ping for the first time in the game my game stutters really bad. Every time after that there isn't any stutter but instead my mouse shoots all the way to the right side of my screen. This bug has been recurring for months and i have tried to repair my client multiple times to no avail. Any ideas at what could cause this? Its driving me crazy!

Step by step explanation.
In game
Click "g" for notification ping.
Left click somewhere to ping.
(if its the first time that game i get massive lag for .5 secs)
Then my Mouse shoots to the side of my screen.

replies.body: This may be an fps issue caused by bad games files or something else.  To really know for sure, I suggest going over the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to know for sure.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) for some automatic processes including a clean repair for a fresh slate.  Let me know if you still have any issues!
